title: Which songs make you feel high? - Quora

response.answer_text: John Denver’s “Calypso” A childhood favorite that always lifted me up.  Park Hyo Shin’s “Gift” (full version is quite long, since this is a concert format so I marked it for starting at a mid-point at 5:40, but the song actually begins with Jung Jae Il at 2:30) (Link to lyrics: Park Hyo-shin - Gift (Lyrics, English, Romanized, Karaoke) - KBEAT)  A couple of more recent toe-tapping selections that are incredibly catchy: Justin Timberlake’s “Can’t Stop The Feeling” Pharrell Williams’ “Happy”
Listen this one will make you feel high MEHNAT Rap - 2S Rapper SAM Sharma
